FuncDef: This command specifies whether to include the source address or destination address or both in the LAG/ECMP hash on IP interfaces. Additionally, when l4-load-balancing is enabled, the command also applies to the inclusion of source/destination port in the hash inputs.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies using the source address and, if l4-load balancing is enabled, the source port in the hash, ignore destination address/port.
Specifies using the destination address and, if l4-load balancing is enabled, the destination port in the hash, ignore source address/port.
Specifies using the inner IP header parameters instead of the outer IP header parameters in the LAG/ECMP hash for IPv4 encapsulated traffic.
